      Since 5.10, use HttpClientRequest and HttpClientResponse

      Deprecated.
      Since 5.10, use HttpServerRequest and HttpServerResponse

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Deprecated.
      Customizes the span based on the request that will be sent to the server.
      <Req> void HttpParser.request​(HttpAdapter<Req,​?> adapter, Req req, brave.SpanCustomizer customizer)
      Deprecated.
      Override to change what data from the http request are parsed into the span representing it.
      <Req> void HttpServerParser.request​(HttpAdapter<Req,​?> adapter, Req req, brave.SpanCustomizer customizer)
      Deprecated.
      Customizes the span based on the request received from the client.
      <Resp> void HttpClientParser.response​(HttpAdapter<?,​Resp> adapter, Resp res, Throwable error, brave.SpanCustomizer customizer)
      Deprecated.
      Customizes the span based on the response received from the server.
      <Resp> void HttpParser.response​(HttpAdapter<?,​Resp> adapter, Resp res, Throwable error, brave.SpanCustomizer customizer)
      Deprecated.
      Override to change what data from the http response or error are parsed into the span modeling it.
      <Resp> void HttpServerParser.response​(HttpAdapter<?,​Resp> adapter, Resp res, Throwable error, brave.SpanCustomizer customizer)
      Deprecated.
      Customizes the span based on the response sent to the client.
      protected <Req> String HttpParser.spanName​(HttpAdapter<Req,​?> adapter, Req req)
      Deprecated.
      Returns the span name of the request or null if the data needed is unavailable.
